lead_paragraph: Having recently lost her sight, Ingrid retreats to the safety of her home-a place she can feel in control, alone with her husband and her thoughts. But Ingrid's real problems lie within, not beyond the walls of her apartment, and her deepest fears and repressed fantasies soon take over.
